item.title: On .NET Live: CountryData.Net - Country Data Made Easy!
item.description:
Does your app need easy access to country data, like phone codes, flags, regions, and more? In this week's episode, community member Isaiah Clifford Opoku shows us how CountryData.Net simplifies country data integration in .NET without relying on third-party services!
Community Links: https://github.com/frankodoom/CountryData.Net https://www.nuget.org/packages/CountryData.Standard/
Featuring: Isaiah Clifford Opoku
#i18n
item.author: (dotnet)

item.title: Building Images: Gzip vs Zstd
item.description: Docker images are downloaded as compressed layers and default to gzip compression. But is there a better option? We compare gzip and zstd compression methods to see which is best for building and pushing images.

item.title: Expanding Your Knowledge With a "Stuff I Didn't Know I Don't Know" List
item.description:
Recently I saw a reddit post of a software engineer "feeling dumb" because of all the things he saw that he did not know.
On this post I replied with a suggestion of keeping a "Stuff I Didn't Know I Don't Know" list, elaborating briefly on how I use mine.

item.title: One in ten 💡 Amin Eftegarie
item.description: A long time ago, a young Japanese man decided to start his own bar. His bar did well, even though he noticed that only a tenth of the people liked his bar enough to come back. The other nine never returned. But that’s all he needed to sustain his business—one in ten.
